\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 51032}

\subsection*{Thanks Doc}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Old Dirty}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 60 mg & oral & Pharms - Temazepam & daily\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 180.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Taking 4 15 mg capsules will make me stupified for about 3 hours until I stay asleep.



I originally was prescribed these to get off percocet from an ATV accident.  I told the doctor I couldn't sleep after he cut me off the pain meds so he gave me a script for 20 of the 15 mg tablets.  I didn't fill it at first until I heard that Temazepam is a benzo drug and I find it to be nice.



It is also a great way to sleep through the sweaty withdrawal from opiods.

\end{document}
